title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 3.32 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 2.89 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
